rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance that welcomes visitors, featuring built-in storage and seating areas. The design includes a transitional space with natural light from adjacent openings.

rooms.name: Mediterranean-style Living Room
rooms.description: Large open living space inspired by Mediterranean aesthetics, featuring exposed brick accents and wooden beams. Large windows for natural light and ventilation aligning with Vastu.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining space adjacent to the kitchen and living room, designed to facilitate easy flow during meals.

rooms.name: Family Room/Kitchen
rooms.description: Open-plan family room integrated with a modern Mediterranean kitchen. Features include natural light-enhancing skylights and large sliding glass doors for cross ventilation in adherence to local building norms.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact yet functional guest bathroom with a window aligned north-east per Vastu recommendations, ensuring privacy and ventilation.

openings.description: Large double doors for entry in line with both local architectural norms and natural light ingress.
High windows in the living room and kitchen to maximize morning light and ventilation.
Large sliding glass doors connecting the family room and garden for improved cross-ventilation.
Strategically placed skylights in the living area to enhance natural light distribution.
